ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro, divided
¼ cup finely diced white onion
½ teaspoon kosher salt for grinding vegetables, plus more to taste
1 lime, juiced, or more to taste

cookingTips: Toast chili and cilantro in mortar and pestle to release aromatics before adding avocado
Cut avocados in half, pit, and scoop flesh directly into bowl to minimize oxidation
Add lime juice immediately to prevent browning and enhance flavor
